channel.title: Comments on: Weaving with Words: Why and How to Improve your Writing

item.title: By: The 7 Steps to starting your own business from scratch –
item.dc:creator: The 7 Steps to starting your own business from scratch –
item.description: […] No matter what kind of business you are planning to start, writting is a skill you need to develop, be it writing business plans, writing a sales copy, or contacting prospective clients, people judge you through your writing. Professional writing is a skill you can take to any aspect of your life. Consider working on it. If you like to learn more about improving your writing check out my article Weaving with words. […]
item.content:encoded: […] No matter what kind of business you are planning to start, writting is a skill you need to develop, be it writing business plans, writing a sales copy, or contacting prospective clients, people judge you through your writing. Professional writing is a skill you can take to any aspect of your life. Consider working on it. If you like to learn more about improving your writing check out my article Weaving with words. […]
